elements.text: You looked forward to being a parent most of your life, so having children has a been a great joy for you. Your own parent's diagnosis of HD prompted you to get tested, and you also have the HD gene. After learning this news, you see each moment with your children as something to be...

elements.name: Time with Children_Presymptomatic_puzzle1
elements.incorrect_feedback: Whoops! That doesn't look right. Please wait a moment and try again.
